main.name: Tim Sanders
main.description: Hardworking team-player with a passion for tech and a urge to learn each and every day. Hoping to create connections with like minded individuals
main.bio: Born and Raised in San Diego, California tech has always been a love of mine. My family was the type that had a computer in every room and a true understanding of how technology flows and works. I love the ins and outs of code and am very excited to begin my career as a web developer.

resume.skillmessage: Full-Stack developer focussed in MERN and Javscript

education.description: Fast paced incredible learning experience with a strong instructor and dedicated class mates. Learned front end styles and javascript, worked in to working with databases, then finished with combing everything in to a full MERN application.

work.title: Executive Chef
work.description: Prior entering the bootcamp I worked as a professional chef. I graduated from Le Cordon Blue in Pasadena, CA in 2010. I worked my way up and was an executive chef for the final 5 years of my career. I managed teams, resolved conflict, handled orders and inventory and focused on learning every day.
